module.name: System Firewall
module.description: Integrated FreePBX Firewall. Currently works with RHEL 6 and RHEL 7 compatible distributions. Note: This requires the Sysadmin RPM. Please see wiki for further information.
module.changelog: *13.0.15.1* #11110 Allow multiple permit entries *13.0.15* Clean up minor bugs #11140, #11127, #11109, #11013 *13.0.14.1* Fix potential permission error on ifcfg file *13.0.14* Add ability to drop instead of reject packets *13.0.13* Better support for vlans and alias'ed interfaces. *13.0.12.2* Remove ability disable *13.0.12.1* Slightly change wording of safe mode. *13.0.12* Tidy up of Services *13.0.11.1* chan_sip fixes, and make an educated guess about jiffies *13.0.10* #10714, and don't try to install if sysadmin-rpm isn't there *13.0.9.2* Do some TODOs *13.0.9.1* Make an array an array. *13.0.9* Detect when things are broken, and rebuild everything. *13.0.8* #10700 - Couldn't save when a custom service was added. *13.0.7.2* Wait until machine has been up for 5 mins before start firewall. *13.0.6.1* Be more patient with incron *13.0.6* Startup fixes *13.0.5.1* #10600, #10616 fixes *13.0.5* Tidy up network configurations *13.0.4* Fix invalid looping array *13.0.3* Fix critical privilege escalation bug, along with other minor ones reported *13.0.2* Remove Beta state. *13.0.1.17* Add status page and ability to remove blocks *13.0.1.16* Custom Services, remove emergency SSH override *13.0.1.14* Dashboard hooks, add blacklist, rework rfw. *13.0.1.13* Fix isTrusted check *13.0.1.12* More pjsip-is-disabled fixes *13.0.1.11* Fix mis-detection of chansip as pjsip *13.0.1.10* Logging! *13.0.1.9* Minor wording and layout issues *13.0.1.8* Finally fix module.sig *13.0.1.7* Allow removing of module *13.0.1.6* Start on system start, if enabled. *13.0.1.5* Publishing error, retrying... *13.0.1.2* First public release *13.0.1.1* Development
